title: Lidl-Trek signs history-making Canadian Holmgren twins as squad creates development program within WorldTour team
content:
British rider Izzy Sharp also joins as Lidl-Trek expands its roster further than ever before.

Read the full article at Lidl-Trek signs history-making Canadian Holmgren twins as squad creates development program within WorldTour team on Velo.
